mapper.select: select sID, sName, sSex, sIDcardNo, sEnrollYear, sPassword, sPhoneNumber, sEmail, dormID, roomID, livingState, schoolState from student order by sID asc
mapper.insert: insert into student(sID, sName, sSex, sIDcardNo, sEnrollYear, sPassword, sPhoneNumber, sEmail, dormID, roomID, livingState, schoolState) values(#{sID}, #{sName}, #{sSex}, #{sIDcardNo}, #{sEnrollYear}, #{sPassword}, #{sPhoneNumber}, #{sEmail}, #{dormID}, #{roomID}, #{livingState}, #{schoolState})
mapper.update: update superAdmin set aName=#{aName}, aSex=#{aSex}, aIDcardNo=#{aIDcardNo}, aPhoneNumber=#{aPhoneNumber}, aEmail=#{aEmail} where aID=#{aID}
mapper.select: select hID, hName, hSex, hIDcardNo, hPassword, hPhoneNumber, hEmail, dormID from houseparent order by hID asc
mapper.insert: insert into houseparent(hID, hName, hSex, hIDcardNo, hPassword, hPhoneNumber, hEmail, dormID) values(#{hID}, #{hName}, #{hSex}, #{hIDcardNo}, #{hPassword}, #{hPhoneNumber}, #{hEmail}, #{dormID})
